name: Fiendforge
description:
Fiendforge is a top-down, fast-paced shooter wherein the player is a warrior intent on holding his ground against the legions of the underworld. The central gameplay revolves around the simple yet bloody core of hot-blooded violence. At the same time, you amass resources to bring an arsenal of gruesome weapons in your final stand against the damned.

Cutting through swathes of demons, you leave behind (and taking) a trail of viscera in an endless fight.

Created in GameMaker Studio 2, Fiendforge is only the beginning of something with a larger scope - but a continuation remains to be decided.
